title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 27.22 - Unauthorized insurer's contractual obligations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 27.22 - Unauthorized insurer's contractual obligations

State Regulations

Nothing herein shall nullify any agreement by an unauthorized insurer to fulfill its contractual obligations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
27.22

Amended, New

York State Register October 8, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 40, eff. 10/8/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
